name: mfe-learning-project
description: Micro Frontend Architecture Learning Project with Webpack Module Federation

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:shell && npm run install:header && npm run install:products && npm run install:orders && npm run install:profile
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:header" "npm run dev:products" "npm run dev:orders" "npm run dev:profile" "npm run dev:shell"
scripts.build: npm run build:header && npm run build:products && npm run build:orders && npm run build:profile && npm run build:shell
scripts.start: npm run start:header & npm run start:products & npm run start:orders & npm run start:profile & npm run start:shell
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy:s3
scripts.deploy:s3: echo 'Deploying to S3...' && npm run deploy:shell:s3 && npm run deploy:header:s3 && npm run deploy:products:s3 && npm run deploy:orders:s3 && npm run deploy:profile:s3

author: MFE Learning Project
